mitigation_methods: Disable Anonymous login on ftp server

detail: Tests for the presence of the vsFTPd 2.3.4 backdoor reported on 2011-07-04
Checks for a stack-based buffer overflow in the ProFTPD server could lead to remote code excution
OPIE off-by-one stack overflow cause Denial Of Service or Code execution
Attempts to exploit an authentication bypass vulnerability in Adobe Coldfusion servers to retrieve a valid administrator's session cookie.
Determines if a ASP.NET application has debugging enabled using a HTTP DEBUG request
mitigation_methods: Turn off debug for asp.net applications

detail: Avaya IP Office systems allow unauthenticated access to the URI '/system/user/scn_user_list' which returns a XML file containing user information such as display name, full name and extension number
mitigation_methods: Update version of Avaya IP Office

detail: Exploits a remote code execution vulnerability in Awstats Totals 1.0 up to 1.14 and possibly other products based on it (CVE: 2008-3922).

Examines cookies set by HTTP services. Reports any session cookies set without the httponly flag. Reports any session cookies set over SSL without the secure flag. If http-enum.nse is also run, any interesting paths found by it will be checked in addition to the root
mitigation_methods: Add httpOnly flag and secure flag

detail: It will try to detect them by checking each form if it contains an unpredictable token for each user. Without one an attacker may forge malicious requests.

Checks for a Git repository found in a website's document root /.git/<something>) and retrieves as much repo information as possible, including language/framework, remotes, last commit message, and repository description
mitigation_methods: Disable access to  .git folder with .htaccess file

detail: It looks for places where attacker-controlled information in the DOM may be used to affect JavaScript execution in certain ways.
mitigation_methods: sanitize parameter before execution in javascript

detail: Exploits insecure file upload forms in web applications using various techniques like changing the Content-type header or creating valid image files containing the payload in the comment
mitigation_methods: sanitize input filename, content-type and signature well

detail: Checks if target machines are vulnerable to the Samba heap overflow vulnerability CVE-2012-1182 could lead to remote code execution

The SMBv1 server in Microsoft Windows Vista SP2; Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1; Windows 7 SP1; Windows 8.1; Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2; Windows RT 8.1; and Windows 10 Gold, 1511, and 1607; and Windows Server 2016 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted packets, aka "Windows SMB Remote Code Execution Vulnerability."
mitigation_methods: Update patch version of product or using IDP to denied service
